params.aggregatorAddress: The Plugin aggregator address from their documentation

params.pToken: The pToken to get the underlying price of

returns._0: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

deployAndRegisterFeed(address,address).notice: Deploy FeedsAccess and register it for an asset (Plugin pattern)

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a pToken asset

isPriceOracle().notice: Indicator that this is a PriceOracle contract (for inspection)

registerFeed(address,address).notice: Register an existing FeedsAccess contract for an asset

setAssetStaleThreshold(address,uint256).notice: Set stale threshold for an asset
